wikipedia_page.main: Leslie Quirk (born 6 March 1965) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at club level for Barrow, St. Helens and Whitehaven, as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.

response: * Les Quirk (born 1965), British Rugby League player
